extendedInfo.description: Word Search PuzzleMania is a classic word search puzzle game, containing 3200+ words. WordSearch PuzzleMania offers a host of exciting features: 1) You can select three different sources of words. Names, English Dictionary and Science/Animals.  Each category contains different theme like name of countries, states, scientists, presidents, xmas, thanks giving, astronomy, chemistry etc.2) Game has great graphics and sound effect. UI is very clean and provides feel of real paper background. 3) Save the state when you get a phone call or exit the game. 4) Provides 'Preview' functionality which shows all 8 words for 5 seconds. 5) Every new game gives you unique set of words. 6) You just need to tap the first and last character of the word to find the correct match. WordSearchPuzzleMania is supported by unobtrusive advertisement.

reviews.title: Good
reviews.comment: It\'s good just too easy. Wish they were more difficult words.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: So freaking boring
reviews.comment: Same words, very repetitive. Found only one error, i would have one word left and it would say i was done. Didn\'t play  long enough  to see anything else

reviews.title: Only 8 words per game!\342\230\205
reviews.comment: Allows drag backwards, Plain, only one background, no landscape play.  With 8 words, so games are pretty quick,  Has a science word choice, sort of.
